(select * from T_ERP_XS_SCDD order by cretime)

(select a.ryxxid,a.rybh,a.xm,c.bmxxid,c.bmbh,c.bmmc,b.jgxxid,b.jgbh,b.jgmc,b.ztxxid from (select * from T_SYS_RYXX where ryzt='启用' and delflag=0) a left join (select * from T_SYS_JGXX where jgzt='启用' and delflag=0) b on a.jgxxid=b.jgxxid left join (select * from T_SYS_BMXX where bmzt='启用' and delflag=0) c on a.bmxxid=c.bmxxid)

(select a.ryxxid,a.rybh,a.xm,a.ryzt,c.bmxxid,c.bmbh,c.bmmc,b.jgxxid,b.jgbh,b.jgmc,b.ztxxid from (select * from T_SYS_RYXX where ryzt='启用' and delflag=0) a left join (select * from T_SYS_JGXX where jgzt='启用' and delflag=0) b on a.jgxxid=b.jgxxid left join (select * from T_SYS_BMXX where bmzt='启用' and delflag=0) c on a.bmxxid=c.bmxxid)

(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPQGDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPXQJHMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_WLXXYS b on a.WLXXYSID=b.WLXXYSID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)

(select a.WLXXYSID,a.WLXXID,a.WLBH,a.WLMC,a.PP,a.NF,a.JJ,a.YSBH,a.YSMC,a.SCSL,to_char(a.JHRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') JHRQ,a.SCDDMXID,a.SCDDID,a.DELFLAG,b.LBM from T_ERP_XS_SCDDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on a.WLXXID=b.WLXXID)
(select a.* b.LBM from T_ERP_BOM_BZBOM a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on a.WLXXID=b.WLXXID)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_KC_CPSLDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on a.WLXXID=b.WLXXID)

(select gys.WLDWXXID,gys.WLDWBH,gys.WLDWMC,gys.DZ,gys.DH,gys.CZ,gys.DZYJ,gys.WLDWLX,gys.STATE,gys.DELFLAG,temp3.GHJG,temp3.ZJGHRQ,temp3.WLXXID,temp3.WLMC from T_ERP_CG_WLDWXX gys left join (select WLDWXXID, WLXXID, GHJG, ZJGHRQ,WLMC from T_ERP_CG_CPGHXX where DELFLAG = '0') temp3 on gys.WLDWXXID = temp3.WLDWXXID)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGDMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on a.CLWZXXID=b.CLWZXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)
(select a.*,b.LBM,b.KSHBJ from T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID where a.qgsl>a.cgsl)

table.pyName: (select MPSZJHBH,SCDDBH,PP,DDLX,DDLB,XDRQ, (case when length(REMARK)>20 then substr(REMARK,0,10)||'...' else REMARK end) as REMARK, LCH,MPSZJHID,STATE,DELFLAG,JHLY FROM T_ERP_CG_MPSZJH)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_MPSZJHMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_WLXXYS b on a.WLXXYSID=b.WLXXYSID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)
(select * from T_ERP_CG_CLWZCGXYMX where DELFLAG = 0)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CLWZCGDDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID where a.cgsl>a.dhtzsl)

table.pyName: (select distinct a.WLXXID, a.WLBH,b.CLWZID,c.LBM from T_ERP_BOM_BZBOM a join T_ERP_BOM_BZBOMMX b on a.BZBOMID = b.BZBOMID left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX c on c.WLXXID=a.WLXXID where a.state='生效')

(select T1.STATE AS STATE,T1.WLMC AS WLMC,T1.PP AS PP,T1.NF AS NF,T1.JJ AS JJ,T1.YSMC AS YSMC, T1.WLXXYSID AS WLXXYSID,nvl(T3.CBDJ, 0) AS CBDJ,a.LBM FROM T_ERP_JC_WLXXYS T1 left join T_ERP_BOM_BZBOM T3 on T1.WLXXID = T3.WLXXID AND T3.DELFLAG = '0' and T3.STATE = '生效' and T3.Bzbombj='1' left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX a on T1.WLXXID=a.WLXXID WHERE T1.DELFLAG = '0' and T1.STATE = '启用' and a.lvl=4)

(select a.clwzxxid,a.clwzbh,a.clwzmc,a.lbm,a.wllb,a.state,a.ggxh,a.bzdwid,a.bzdwmc,a.jldwid,a.jldwmc,a.hsgx ,b.jjbl,c.cbdj from t_erp_jc_clwzxx a left join t_erp_xs_jjbl b on a.clwzxxid = b.wlxxid and b.delflag=0 left join t_erp_bom_bzbom c on a.clwzxxid = c.wlxxid and c.delflag=0 where 1=1 and a.delflag=0 )
(SELECT U.BMXXID,U.BMMC,U.BMBH,U.JGXXID,U.ZTXXID,J.JGBH,J.JGMC,U.BMJC,U.BMZT FROM T_SYS_BMXX U LEFT JOIN T_SYS_JGXX J ON U.JGXXID=J.JGXXID WHERE /*U.BMZT in ('启用','制定') and*/ U.DELFLAG = 0)

(select a.CLWZXXID, a.CLWZBH, a.CLWZMC, a.GGXH, a.BZDWID, a.BZDWMC, (NVL(a.XQSL,0)- NVL(a.QGSL,0)) as XQSL, to_char(a.XDRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')XDRQ, to_char(a.XQRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')XQRQ, to_char(a.CNJQ,'YYYY-MM-DD')CNJQ, a.CLWZXQJHMXID, a.CLWZXQJHID, a.delflag, a.WLXXYSID,b.LBM,b.KSHBJ from T_ERP_CG_CLWZXQJHMX a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID where to_number(NVL(a.XQSL,0)) > to_number(NVL(a.QGSL,0)))
table.lgName: 材料物资需求计划明细

table.pyName: (select b.clwzxxid,b.LBM,b.clwzbh,a.bzdwid,a.jldwid,b.wllb,b.ggxh,b.clwzmc,b.bzdwmc,b.jldwmc,b.hsgx,nvl(c.lsjg, 0) lsjg,qyid,kfxxid,a.kcsl FROM (select * from t_erp_jc_clwzxx where state='启用' and delflag=0)b left join (select sum(kcsl) kcsl,clwzxxid,kfxxid,jldwid,bzdwid from t_erp_jz_clkcssz group by clwzxxid, kfxxid, jldwid,bzdwid) a on a.clwzxxid = b.clwzxxid left join (select lsjg, qyid, clwzxxid from t_erp_xs_clwzxsjgmx xsjgmx, t_erp_xs_clwzxsjg xsjg where xsjgmx.clwzxsjgid = xsjg.clwzxsjgid and xsjg.state = '审核通过' and xsjgmx.delflag = 0 and xsjg.delflag = 0)c on b.clwzxxid = c.clwzxxid)

(select a.ryxxid,a.rybh,a.xm,c.bmxxid,c.bmbh,c.bmmc,b.jgxxid,b.jgbh,b.jgmc from (select * from T_SYS_RYXX where (ryzt='启用' or ryzt='停用') and delflag=0) a left join (select * from T_SYS_JGXX where (jgzt='启用' or jgzt='停用') and delflag=0) b on a.jgxxid=b.jgxxid left join (select * from T_SYS_BMXX where (bmzt='启用' or bmzt='停用') and delflag=0) c on a.bmxxid=c.bmxxid)
(select * from T_ERP_CG_WLDWXX a where a.wldwlx='客户')
(select * from T_ERP_CG_WLDWXX a where (a.wldwlx='门店' or a.wldwlx='客户') and a.delflag=0 )

table.pyName: (select distinct a.CPQGDID,a.LCH,a.CPQGDBH,a.YDDBJ,a.DDLX,a.DDLB,a.SCFS,a.CGZID,a.CGZMC,a.CGZCYID,a.CGRXM from T_ERP_CG_CPQGD a, T_ERP_CG_CPQGDMX b where a.CPQGDID = b.CPQGDID and (b.QGSL - b.CGSL) > 0 and a.STATE = '审核通过' and a.DELFLAG = 0 and b.DELFLAG = 0 and ((a.YDDBJ = 1) or ( b.WLDWXXID is not null and b.CGDJ > 0)))
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPQGDMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on a.WLXXID=b.WLXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0 and (a.QGSL - a.CGSL) > 0 )
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPQGDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID where a.qgsl>a.cgsl)

table.pyName: (select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID and a.DELFLAG = 0 and a.bysl = 0)

(select * from T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLDMX where DELFLAG = 0 and bysl = 0 and CLWZSLDMX not in (select nvl(zj.CLWZSLDMX,'#') from T_ERP_ZJ_CLWZZJTZD zj where zj.DELFLAG=0) and CLWZXXID in (select CLWZXXID from T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX t where t.DELFLAG=0 and t.state='启用' and t.zjbj=1))

(select t4.Wlxxysid,t4.yssh ysbh,t4.ysmc,t4.wlxxid as wlxxid, t4.wlbh, t4.wlmc, t4.pp, t4.nf, t4.jj, t2.SEDT_AMOUNT, t2.SEDT_PRICE, t1.SHOP_CODE, t1.SELL_SALEDATE RQ,t1.sell_code, sum(t2.SEDT_AMOUNT) JSSL, sum(nvl(t2.SEDT_TKNAMOUNT,0)) ZKJE, t1.sell_code cpckdbh, t1.sell_seller ywyxm, max(t2.SEDT_PRICE) JSDJ,max(t2.SEDT_PRICE) zkdj from dmsshopsell t1 left join dmsshopselldt t2 on t1.SELL_CODE = t2.SELL_CODE and t1.shop_code = t2.shop_code left join t_erp_jc_wlzhtmdz t3 on upper(t2.Sedt_Barcode) = upper(t3.tm) left join t_erp_jc_wlzh t4 on t3.wlzhid = t4.wlzhid and t4.delflag=0 where 1=1 group by t1.sell_seller,t1.sell_code,t2.SEDT_AMOUNT, t2.SEDT_PRICE, t1.SHOP_CODE, t1.SELL_SALEDATE, t4.Wlxxysid,t4.yssh,t4.ysmc,t4.wlxxid, t4.wlbh,t4.wlmc,t4.pp, t4.nf, t4.jj )
(select * from T_ERP_CG_WLDWXX a where a.wldwlx='供应商')
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_SCRWD a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_SCRWDMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on a.CLWZXXID=b.CLWZXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)
(select a.*,b.LBM from t_erp_kc_cpckdmx a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID)

(select DISTINCT t.clwzid, t.clwzbh, t.clwzmc, t.ggxh, t.bzdwid, t.bzdwmc,u.wlxxid,NVL(s.sjflsl,0) as sjflsl ,s.scrwdid,a.LBM from T_ERP_BOM_BZBOMMX t left join t_erp_cg_scrwdmx s on t.clwzid = s.clwzxxid and s.delflag=0, t_erp_bom_bzbom u left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX a on u.wlxxid=a.wlxxid where t.bzbomid = u.bzbomid and t.delflag=0 and u.delflag=0)

(select a.cprkdid djid,a.cprkdbh djh,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc, b.pp,b.jj,b.nf,b.wlxxid,b.wlbh,b.wlmc,max(b.hsdj)hsdj, sum(b.hsje) hsje,max(b.sl)sl,max(b.bhsdj)bhsdj,sum(b.bhsje)bhsje,sum(nvl(b.rksl,0)-nvl(b.kpsl,0)) crksl,c.LBM from t_erp_kc_cprkd a ,(select * from t_erp_kc_cprkdmx c where c.delflag=0)b left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX c on b.WLXXID=c.WLXXID where a.cprkdid = b.cprkdid and a.delflag=0 and a.state='已处理' having sum(nvl(b.rksl,0)-nvl(b.kpsl,0))>0 group by a.cprkdid,a.cprkdbh,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc, b.pp,b.jj,b.nf,b.wlxxid,b.wlbh,b.wlmc,c.lbm )
(select w.kwxxid, w.kwbh, w.kwmc from T_ERP_KC_KWXX w where w.delflag = '0' and w.KFXXID in (select f.KFXXID from T_ERP_KC_KFXX f where f.state = '启用' and f.delflag = '0'))

field.lgName: 成品转储差异调整单编号

table.pyName: (select t.WLZHID,t.WLBH,t.WLMC,a.bzdwid,a.bzdwmc,a.LBM from t_erp_jc_wlzh t left join t_erp_jc_wlxx a on a.wlxxid=t.wlxxid and a.delflag='0' where t.DELFLAG='0' AND t.STATE='启用' )
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_WWFLDMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on a.CLWZXXID=b.CLWZXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)

(select a.clwzrkdid djid,a.clwzrkdbh djh,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc, b.clwzxxid,b.clwzbh,b.clwzmc,max(b.hsdj)hsdj, sum(b.hsje) hsje,max(b.sl)sl,max(b.bhsdj)bhsdj,sum(b.bhsje)bhsje,sum(nvl(b.rksl,0)-nvl(b.kpsl,0)) crksl,c.LBM from t_erp_kc_clwzrkd a ,(select * from t_erp_kc_clwzrkdmx c where c.delflag=0)b left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX c on b.CLWZXXID=c.CLWZXXID where a.clwzrkdid = b.clwzrkdid and a.delflag=0 and a.state='已处理' having sum(nvl(b.rksl,0)-nvl(b.kpsl,0))>0 group by a.clwzrkdid,a.clwzrkdbh,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc, b.clwzxxid,b.clwzbh,b.clwzmc,c.LBM )
(select a.*,b.LBM from t_erp_kc_clwzckdmx a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID)
PS：动态表
PS：动态表
( select DWID as JLDWID,DWMC as JLDWMC,HSGX,WLXXID,STATE,CLWZXXID,DWID,DWMC,DELFLAG from T_ERP_JC_WLDW where DWLX='计量单位')
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPCGDDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID)

(select a.SCRWDID,a.DELFLAG,a.CLWZXXID,a.CLWZBH,a.CLWZMC,a.GGXH,a.BZDWID,a.BZDWMC,a.JLDWID,a.JLDWMC,a.HSGX, (NVL(a.JHFLSL, 0) - NVL(a.SJFLSL, 0)) as FLSL,(NVL(a.JLJHFLSL, 0) - NVL(a.SJJLFLSL, 0)) as JLFLSL,a.SCRWDMXID,b.kcsl,c.LBM from T_ERP_CG_SCRWDMX a left join T_ERP_JZ_CLKCSSZ b on a.clwzxxid=b.clwzxxid left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX c on c.clwzxxid=a.clwzxxid)

(select a.cpcgddid,a.cpcgddbh,a.htbh,a.wldwxxid,c.wlxxid,c.wlbh,c.wlmc,sum(nvl(c.rksl,0)-nvl(c.jssl,0)) rksl, c.hsdj,max(c.sl) sl,c.pp,c.nf,c.jj,d.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPCGDD a left join T_ERP_KC_CPRKD b on a.lch = b.lch left join T_ERP_KC_CPRKDMX c on b.cprkdid = c.cprkdid left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX d on d.wlxxid=c.wlxxid where a.state = '审核通过' and a.delflag = 0 and b.state = '已处理' and b.delflag = 0 and c.delflag = 0 having sum(nvl(c.rksl,0)-nvl(c.jssl,0))>0 group by a.cpcgddid,a.cpcgddbh,a.htbh,a.wldwxxid,c.wlxxid,c.wlbh,c.wlmc,c.hsdj,c.pp,c.nf,c.jj,d.LBM)

(select a.wlxxid, b.bzbommxid, b.wllx, b.clwzbh, b.clwzmc, min(b.ygdj) ygdj from t_erp_bom_bzbom a left join t_erp_bom_bzbommx b on a.bzbomid = b.bzbomid where a.delflag = 0 and b.delflag = 0 and a.state = '生效' and b.wllx = '特殊工艺' group by a.wlxxid, b.bzbommxid, b.wllx, b.clwzbh, b.clwzmc)

(select a.cpkkdid, a.wldwxxid, b.ddh, b.cpkkdmxid, b.wlxxid, b.kkje, b.kklx from t_erp_cw_cpkkd a left join t_erp_cw_cpkkdmx b on a.cpkkdid = b.cpkkdid where a.delflag = 0 and b.delflag = 0 and a.state = '审核通过' and b.jsdmxid is null and b.jsdid is null)

(select a.cpckdid djid,a.cpckdbh djh,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc, b.pp,b.jj,b.nf,b.wlxxid,b.wlbh,b.wlmc,max(b.hsdj)hsdj, sum(b.hsje) hsje,max(b.sl)sl,max(b.bhsdj)bhsdj,sum(b.bhsje)bhsje ,sum(nvl(b.sjcksl,0)-nvl(b.kpsl,0)) crksl ,d.LBM from t_erp_kc_cpckd a ,(select * from t_erp_kc_cpckdmx c where c.delflag=0)b left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX d on d.wlxxid=b.wlxxid where a.cpckdid = b.cpckdid and a.delflag=0 and a.state='已处理' having sum(nvl(b.sjcksl,0)-nvl(b.kpsl,0))>0 group by a.cpckdid,a.cpckdbh,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc, b.pp,b.jj,b.nf,b.wlxxid,b.wlbh,b.wlmc,d.LBM )

(select distinct a.CLWZQGDID,a.LCH,a.CLWZQGDBH,a.YDDBJ,a.DDLX,a.DDLB,a.SCFS,a.CGZID,a.CGZMC,a.CGZCYID,a.CGRXM from T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGD a, T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGDMX b where a.CLWZQGDID = b.CLWZQGDID and (b.QGSL - b.CGSL) > 0 and a.STATE = '审核通过' and a.DELFLAG = 0 and b.DELFLAG = 0 and ((a.YDDBJ = 1) or ( b.WLDWXXID is not null and b.CGDJ > 0)))
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGDMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on a.CLWZXXID=b.CLWZXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)

(select c.*,d.cmsort from T_ERP_KC_CPRKDZXMX c join (select a.*,b.cmsort from T_ERP_JC_WLZH a left join T_ERP_JC_CMLMX b on a.CML=b.CMLID and a.CM=b.CM and b.DELFLAG=0) d on d.cm=c.cm and d.wlxxysid=c.wlxxysid where c.DELFLAG = 0 and d.delflag=0 order by d.cmsort)

(select u.WLXXYSID,u.WLXXID,u.PP,u.NF,u.JJ,u.WLBH,u.WLMC,u.YSBH,u.YSMC,u.SCSL,u.SCFS, to_char(u.SQXQRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') SQXQRQ,to_char(u.CGCNJQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') CGCNJQ,u.MPSZJHMXID,u.DELFLAG,u.MPSZJHID, x.xqsl,nvl(z.qgsl,'0') qgsl,a.LBM from t_erp_cg_mpszjhmx u left join (select t.mpszjhmxid,t.scfs,sum(t.xqsl) xqsl from t_erp_cg_mrpysjg t group by t.mpszjhmxid,scfs) x on u.mpszjhmxid = x.mpszjhmxid and u.scfs = x.scfs left join (select qgsl,mpszjhmxid from t_erp_cg_cpxqjhmx where delflag=0) z on u.mpszjhmxid = z.mpszjhmxid left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX a on a.wlxxid=u.wlxxid)

(select a.CLWZSLDID,a.CLWZSLDBH,a.CGDDBH,a.HTBH,a.WLDWXXID,b.CLWZXXID,b.CLWZBH,b.CLWZMC,b.GGXH,b.BZDWMC,b.WLXXYSID, b.HSDJ,b.RKSL,b.RKSL as KKJS,d.LBM from T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLD a,(select * from T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLDMX c where c.DELFLAG=0)b left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX d on d.clwzxxid=b.clwzxxid where a.CLWZSLDID=b.CLWZSLDID and a.DELFLAG=0 and a.STATE='已处理')

(select WLXXID, cpcgddid, WLBH, WLMC, min(to_char(XDRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) as XDRQ, min(to_char(XQRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) as XQRQ, NF, JJ, PP, sum(CGSL) as CGSL, sum(SCRWSL) as SCRWSL from T_ERP_CG_CPCGDDMX where delflag = 0 group by wlxxid, wlbh, wlmc, nf, jj, pp, cpcgddid)
(SELECT B.SJZDMXID,B.SJXMC as BJXMBH, B.SJXZ as BJXMMC,A.SJZDMC FROM T_SYS_SJZD A, T_SYS_SJZDMX B WHERE A.SJZDID = B.SJZDID AND B.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.STATE = '启用')

( select CLWZZJTZDID,CLWZZJDBH,WLDWXXID,WLDWBH,WLDWMC,CLWZXXID,CLWZCGDBH,CLWZBH,CLWZMC,GGXH,BZDWID,BZDWMC,JLDWID,JLDWMC, HSGX,TZSL,JLTZSL,TZBHGSL,JLTZBHGSL,JYTHSL,JLJYTHSL,JYRID,JYRXM,to_char(JYSJ, 'yyyy-MM-dd ') JYSJ,a.LCH,c.LBM from T_ERP_ZJ_CLWZZJTZD a left join T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLD b on b.CLWZSLDID = a.LYDJID left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX c on c.clwzxxid=a.clwzxxid where a.BYLX = '入库质检' and a.DELFLAG='0' )

table.pyName: (select b.wlxxysid,b.wlxxid,b.wlmc,b.wlbh,b.pp,b.nf,b.jj,b.ysbh,b.ysmc,sum(nvl(a.kcsl,0) - nvl(a.djsl,0)) djsl,a.kfxxid,a.kwxxid,b.lbm from (select * from t_erp_jc_wlxxys where delflag=0 and state='启用') b left join t_erp_jz_cpkcssz a on a.wlxxysid = b.wlxxysid group by b.wlxxysid,b.wlxxid,b.wlmc,b.wlbh,b.pp,b.nf,b.jj,b.ysbh,b.ysmc,a.kfxxid,a.kwxxid,b.lbm)
(select distinct WLDWXXID ,WLDWBH, WLDWMC from T_ERP_JZ_CPKCLSZ where WLDWXXID is not null)
(select a.SJXZ,a.SJZDMXID,a.SJXMC from T_SYS_SJZDmx a,T_SYS_SJZD b where a.SJZDID=b.SJZDID and b.SJZDBH='MFXQ' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0)
(select distinct a.*,b.pcbh,b.KFXXID from t_erp_jc_clwzxx a join T_ERP_JZ_CLKCSSZ b on a.clwzxxid = b.clwzxxid where a.DELFLAG=0 and a.STATE='启用')

(select distinct a.* from t_erp_kc_kfxx a join T_ERP_JZ_CLKCSSZ b on a.kfxxid = b.kfxxid where a.DELFLAG=0 and a.STATE='启用')
(select distinct a.*,b.KFXXID from t_erp_jc_wlxxys a join t_erp_jz_cpkcssz b on a.wlxxysid = b.wlxxysid where a.delflag=0 and a.state='启用')
(select distinct a.*,b.WLXXYSID from t_erp_kc_kwxx a join t_erp_jz_cpkcssz b on a.kwxxid = b.kwxxid where a.DELFLAG=0 and a.STATE='启用')
(select distinct a.* from t_erp_kc_kfxx a join t_erp_jz_cpkcssz b on a.kfxxid = b.kfxxid where a.DELFLAG=0 and a.STATE='启用')

(select distinct m.kfxxid, m.kwxxid,m.clwzxxid,p.clwzbh,p.clwzmc,p.ggxh,p.hsgx,m.bzdwid,p.bzdwmc, m.jldwid,p.jldwmc,nvl(m.kcsl,0) - nvl(n.sl,0) djsl,nvl(m.jlkcsl, 0) - nvl(n.jlsl, 0) jldjsl,p.lbm,m.pcbh from (select * from t_erp_jc_clwzxx where delflag=0 and state='启用') p left join t_erp_jz_clkcssz m on m.clwzxxid = p.clwzxxid left join (select sum(nvl(djsl,0)) sl,sum(nvl(b.jldjsl,0))jlsl,clwzxxid from t_erp_kc_clkcdj a inner join t_erp_kc_clkcdjmx b on a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and a.clkcdjid = b.clkcdjid and a.state != '解冻' group by clwzxxid) n on m.clwzxxid = n.clwzxxid)

table.pyName: (select t1.cpckdbh,t2.cpckmxid,t1.wldwxxid,t1.wldwbh,t1.wldwmc,t2.wlxxysid,t2.wlxxid,t2.wlbh,t2.wlmc,t2.zkdj, t2.ysbh,t2.ysmc ,nvl(t2.sjcksl,0)-nvl(t2.jssl,0) SEDT_AMOUNT,t2.hsdj SEDT_PRICE,t2.sl, t2.pp,t2.nf,t2.jj from t_erp_kc_cpckd t1 right join t_erp_kc_cpckdmx t2 on t1.cpckdid = t2.cpckdid and t2.delflag=0 where 1=1 and (nvl(t2.sjcksl,0)-nvl(t2.jssl,0))>0 and t1.state='已处理')

(select t1.clwzckdbh,t2.clwzckdmxid, t1.wldwxxid, t1.wldwbh, t1.wldwmc, t2.clwzxxid, t2.clwzbh, t2.clwzmc, t2.ggxh,t2.sl,t2.bzdwid, t2.bzdwmc,nvl(t2.sjcksl,0)-nvl(t2.jssl,0) jssl,t2.hsdj jsdj from t_erp_kc_clwzckd t1 right join t_erp_kc_clwzckdmx t2 on t1.clwzckdid = t2.clwzckdid and t2.delflag = 0 where 1 = 1 and t1.state = '已处理' and (nvl(t2.sjcksl,0)-nvl(t2.jssl,0))>0)

table.pyName: (select a.CLWZSLDID,a.CLWZSLDBH,a.ZTXXID,b.CLWZSLDMX,b.WLXXYSID,b.CLWZXXID,b.CLWZBH,b.CLWZMC,b.GGXH,c.LBM from T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLD a,T_ERP_KC_CLWZSLDMX b,T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX c where a.CLWZSLDID=b.CLWZSLDID and b.CLWZXXID=c.CLWZXXID and a.DELFLAG=0 and b.DELFLAG=0 and c.DELFLAG=0 and a.STATE='已处理')
table.lgName: 材料物资收料单和明细
材料物资第三方质检报告

field.lgName: 材料物资第三方质检报告单编号

table.pyName: (select distinct CLWZXQJHMXID,WLXXYSID,WLXXID,WLMC from t_erp_cg_clxqjhcpdz)
table.lgName: 材料物资需求计划成品对照

table.pyName: (select distinct t1.* from t_erp_cg_clwzcgdd t1, t_erp_cg_clwzcgddmx t2 where t1.clwzcgddid = t2.clwzcgddid and (t2.cgsl - t2.dhtzsl) > 0)

field.lgName: 材料物资采购订单编号

table.pyName: (select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CLWZCGDDMX a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on a.CLWZXXID=b.CLWZXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)
table.lgName: 材料物资采购订单明细

table.pyName: (select distinct t1.* from t_erp_cg_cpcgdd t1, t_erp_cg_cpcgddmx t2 where t1.cpcgddid = t2.cpcgddid and (t2.cgsl - t2.dhtzsl) > 0)
(select a.*,b.LBM from t_erp_cg_cpcgddmx a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on a.WLXXID=b.WLXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0 and (a.cgsl - a.dhtzsl) > 0 )

field.lgName: 材料物资调整入库单编号

table.pyName: (select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_KC_CLWZJCDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID and a.delflag=0)

(select distinct t1.*,t3.bgbomid from t_erp_cg_cpcgdd t1, t_erp_cg_cpcgddmx t2, t_erp_bom_bgbom t3 where t1.cpcgddid = t2.cpcgddid and t2.wlxxysid = t3.wlxxysid and t1.state not in('提交','审核通过') and t1.delflag=0 and t2.delflag=0)
(SELECT CM,WLZHID,WLXXYSID FROM T_ERP_JC_WLZH WHERE DELFLAG=0 )

(select a.sjzdid,a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,b.sjzdmc,b.state,c.keycode sjkeycode,c.sjxz sjsjxz from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = a.sjsjzdmxid where 1=1 and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 )

field.lgName: 材料物资盘点定义编号

table.pyName: (SELECT SJZDMXID,SJXMC,SJXZ,sjzdid,sjgl,DELFLAG FROM T_SYS_SJZDMX)

(select b.wlxxysid,b.wlxxid,b.wlmc,b.wlbh,b.pp,b.nf,b.jj,b.ysbh,b.ysmc,a.kfxxid,a.kwxxid,c.kwbh,c.kwmc from (select * from t_erp_jc_wlxxys where delflag=0 and state='启用') b left join (select wlxxysid,kfxxid,kwxxid from t_erp_jz_cpkcssz group by wlxxysid,kfxxid,kwxxid)a on a.wlxxysid=b.wlxxysid left join (select * from t_erp_kc_kwxx where delflag=0 and state='启用') c on a.kwxxid=c.kwxxid and a.kfxxid=c.kfxxid )

field.lgName: 材料物资采购订单编号

table.pyName: (select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CLWZCGDDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID and a.delflag=0)
table.lgName: 材料物资采购订单明细

table.pyName: (select a.CLWZQGDMXID,a.delflag,a.clwzqgdid,a.cgdj,a.jlqgsl,a.qgsl,b.clwzxxid,b.clwzbh,b.clwzmc,a.wlxxysid,b.ggxh,b.lbm,b.bzdwid,b.bzdwmc,b.jldwid,b.jldwmc,b.hsgx from T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGDMX a,(select * from t_erp_jc_clwzxx where delflag=0 and state='启用')b where a.clwzxxid=b.clwzxxid)

(select distinct t.wlxxysid,t.wlxxid,t.wlbh,t.wlmc,t.pp,t.nf,t.jj,t.ysbh,t.ysmc,u.kfxxid,u.kwxxid, k.kwbh,k.kwmc,(t.wlxxysid||u.kwxxid)WLKW from t_erp_jc_wlxxys t, t_erp_jz_cpkcssz u left join t_erp_kc_kwxx k on u.kwxxid = k.kwxxid where t.wlxxysid = u.wlxxysid and t.delflag=0)

(select a.sjzdmxid,a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,c.keycode sjkeycode from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = a.sjsjzdmxid where b.sjzdmc='辅料编码对照' and a.sjgl='颜色' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and b.state='启用')

(select KFBH,KFMC,KFXXID,WLDWXXID,WLDWBH,WLDWMC,SQJCRY,CPJCDBH,CPJCDID from T_ERP_KC_CPJCD bbb where bbb.cpjcdid in (select distinct a.cpjcdid from T_ERP_KC_CPJCDMX a where (nvl(a.sjjcsl,0) - nvl(a.yhhsl,0)) > 0 and a.delflag=0) and bbb.delflag=0 and bbb.state='已借出' )

(select distinct t.CLWZXXID, t.CLWZBH, t.CLWZMC, t.GGXH, t.BZDWID, t.BZDWMC, t.JLDWID, t.JLDWMC, t.hsgx, u.pcbh, u.kfxxid, u.kwxxid, k.kwbh, k.kwmc,(t.CLWZXXID||u.kwxxid||u.pcbh)CLKW from t_erp_jc_clwzxx t, T_ERP_JZ_CLKCSSZ u left join t_erp_kc_kwxx k on u.kwxxid = k.kwxxid where t.CLWZXXID = u.CLWZXXID and t.delflag = 0)

(select distinct T1.WLXXID, T1.STATE,T1.WLMC,T1.WLBH,T1.PP AS PP,T1.NF AS NF,T1.JJ AS JJ, nvl(T3.CBDJ, 0) AS CBDJ,T1.LBM FROM T_ERP_JC_WLXX T1 left join T_ERP_BOM_BZBOM T3 on T1.WLXXID = T3.WLXXID AND T3.DELFLAG = '0' and T3.STATE = '生效' and T3.Bzbombj='1' WHERE T1.DELFLAG = '0' and T1.STATE = '启用' and T1.lvl=4)

(select a.WLDWXXID, A.WLDWBH, A.WLDWMC, b.*, c.lbm,c.KSHBJ from t_erp_cg_clwzcgxy a left join t_erp_cg_clwzcgxymx b on a.clwzcgxyid = b.clwzcgxyid left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX c on b.CLWZXXID = c.CLWZXXID and c.delflag = '0' where a.delflag = '0' and b.delflag = '0')
(select * from T_ERP_KC_CPHHDMX where delflag=0)

(select scrwdid,wlxxysid, WLXXID, PP, nf, jj, wlbh, wlmc, ysbh, ysmc, sum(cmsl)GDSL,QCSYBJ from t_erp_cg_scrwdcmmx where delflag = 0 group by scrwdid,wlxxysid, WLXXID, PP, nf, jj, wlbh, wlmc, ysbh, ysmc, QCSYBJ)

(select scrwdid,wlxxysid, WLXXID, PP, nf, jj, wlbh, wlmc, ysbh, ysmc, sum(cmsl)GDSL,QCSYBJ from t_erp_cg_scrwdcmmx where delflag = 0 group by scrwdid,wlxxysid, WLXXID, PP, nf, jj, wlbh, wlmc, ysbh, ysmc, QCSYBJ)
(select a.*,b.LBM from T_ERP_CG_CPCGDDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX b on b.WLXXID=a.WLXXID)
(select b.sjzdbh,b.sjzdmc,a.sjxmc from (select * from T_SYS_SJZDmx where delflag=0)a left join (select * from T_SYS_SJZD where delflag=0 and state='启用') b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid)
(select a.SJZDBH,c.sjxmc as SJZLXM,b.sjxmc as ZLXM from T_SYS_SJZD a left join T_SYS_SJZDMX b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = b.sjsjzdmxid)
(select a.*,b.LBM,b.KSHBJ from T_ERP_CG_CLWZQGDMX a left join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on b.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID where a.qgsl>a.cgsl)
table.lgName: 材料物资请购单明细信息

table.pyName: ( select a.keycode,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,c.keycode sjkeycode from T_SYS_SJZDMX a left join T_SYS_SJZD b on a.sjzdid=b.sjzdid left join T_SYS_SJZDMX c on c.sjzdmxid = a.sjsjzdmxid where b.sjzdmc='辅料编码对照' and a.sjgl='小类' and a.delflag=0 and b.delflag=0 and b.state='启用')
T_ERP_KC_CPJCDXMMX

(select c.*,d.cmsort from T_ERP_KC_CPJCDZXMX c join (select a.*,b.cmsort from T_ERP_JC_WLZH a left join T_ERP_JC_CMLMX b on a.CML=b.CMLID and a.CM=b.CM and b.DELFLAG=0) d on d.cm=c.cm and d.wlxxysid=c.wlxxysid where c.DELFLAG = 0 and d.delflag=0 order by d.cmsort)
T_ERP_KC_CPHHDXMMX

(select bylx, CPZJTZDID,LCH, WLXXYSID,CPZJDBH,WLDWBH,WLDWMC,LYDJBH,TZSL,(TZHGSL+TZBHGSL)YJSL,(TZSL-TZHGSL-TZBHGSL)CYSL,STATE,DELFLAG from t_erp_zj_cpzjtzd where state='待检' and delflag=0 and (TZSL - TZHGSL - TZBHGSL) > 0)
(select YHZH,YHMC,YHMC||'('||YHZH||')' FKYH from t_erp_cw_interfaceyhzh t)
(SELECT B.SJZDMXID,B.SJXMC, B.SJXZ,A.SJZDMC FROM T_SYS_SJZD A, T_SYS_SJZDMX B WHERE A.SJZDID = B.SJZDID AND B.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.STATE = '启用')
(SELECT B.SJZDMXID,B.SJXMC, B.SJXZ,A.SJZDMC FROM T_SYS_SJZD A, T_SYS_SJZDMX B WHERE A.SJZDID = B.SJZDID AND B.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.DELFLAG = 0 AND A.STATE = '启用' AND A.SJZDMC='采购类型')

((select a.bmbh As BH,a.bmmc as MC,a.bmxxid as XXID from T_SYS_BMXX a where a.delflag=0 and a.bmzt='启用') union (select WLDWBH as BH, WLDWMC as MC, WLDWXXID as XXID from T_ERP_CG_WLDWXX where delflag = 0 and state = '启用' and wldwlx = '供应商' ))
(select a.*,b.JGMC,c.BMMC from T_SYS_RYXX a join T_SYS_JGXX b on a.JGXXID=b.JGXXID join T_SYS_BMXX c on a.BMXXID=c.BMXXID)
(select t.* from t_erp_kc_cprkd t where t.DELFLAG=0 and t.STATE='未处理' and t.RKXH is not null and t.rklx != 'CGRKCCJ' and (t.ccjbj = 0 or t.ccjbj is null))
(select * from T_ERP_KC_CLWZHHDMX where delflag=0)

(select a.CPCCKXMBH as XMBH,a.ZXSL,a.SMRMC,a.CPCKDXMMXID as XMMXID,b.WLDWBH,b.WLDWMC,to_char(a.zxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ZXSJ from T_ERP_KC_CPCKDXMMX a join T_ERP_KC_CPCKD b on a.CPCKDID=b.CPCKDID where a.DELFLAG = 0 union all select c.CLWZCCKXMBH as XMBH,c.ZXSL,'' SMRMC,c.CLWZCKDXMMXID as XMMXID,d.WLDWBH,d.WLDWMC,to_char(C.zxsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ZXSJ from T_ERP_KC_CLWZCKDXMMX c join T_ERP_KC_CLWZCKD d on c.CLWZCKDID=d.CLWZCKDID where c.DELFLAG = 0)
(select a.*,b.WLDWBH,b.WLDWMC,to_char(a.ZXSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') SMSJ from T_ERP_KC_CPRKXMMX a join T_ERP_KC_CPRKD b on a.CPRKDID=b.CPRKDID and a.DELFLAG = 0)

(select distinct a.KFXXID,a.KWXXID,a.pcbh,b.KWBH,b.KWMC,c.CLWZBH,c.CLWZMC,c.LBM,c.BZDWMC from T_ERP_JZ_CLKCSSZ a join T_ERP_KC_KWXX b on a.KWXXID=b.KWXXID join T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX c on c.CLWZXXID=a.CLWZXXID where b.DELFLAG=0 and STATE='启用' and c.DELFLAG=0 and c.STATE='启用')
(select * from T_ERP_KC_CPZCDMX where delflag=0)
(select a.ZXXHID as XHID,a.XMCZID,a.XMBH,a.DELFLAG,a.SMRID,a.SMRMC,a.ZXSJ from T_ERP_KC_ZXXH a )
(select * from T_ERP_JZ_CPKCZXMXSSZ where KCZTBJ != 1 or KCZTBJ is null)

(select CLWZXXID,CLWZBH,CLWZMC,LBM,GGXH,MF,WLLB,BZDWID,BZDWMC,JLDWID,JLDWMC,HSGX,KSHBJ,delflag,state, 0 TZCKSL,0 SJCKSL,0 JLTZCKSL,0 JLSJCKSL,nvl(LSJG,0) HSDJ,0 HSJE,0.17 SL,round(nvl(LSJG,0)/(1+0.17),4) BHSDJ,0 BHSJE from t_erp_jc_clwzxx)
PS：动态表
table.lgName: 材料物资请购单明细信息

table.pyName: (select a.CPZJTZDID,a.CPZJDBH,a.WLDWXXID,a.WLDWBH,a.WLDWMC,a.WLXXID,a.WLBH,a.WLMC,a.PP,a.NF,a.JJ,a.YSBH,a.YSMC,a.WLXXYSID,a.TZSL, a.TZBHGSL,nvl(d.YTZBHGSL,0) YTZBHGSL,nvl(a.TZBHGSL,0)-nvl(d.YTZBHGSL,0)KTZBHGSL ,a.JYTHSL,a.JYRID, a.JYRXM,to_char(a.JYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd ') JYSJ,a.LCH,c.LBM from T_ERP_ZJ_CPZJTZD a left join T_ERP_KC_CPSLD b on b.CPSLDID=a.LYDJID left join T_ERP_JC_WLXX c on c.WLXXID=a.WLXXID left join (select cpzjtzdid,CPZJDBH,SUM(nvl(THSL,0)+nvl(RBJSSL,0)+nvl(XSSL,0)+nvl(BFSL,0))YTZBHGSL from t_erp_zj_cpbltzd where 1=1 and state='审核通过' GROUP BY cpzjtzdid,CPZJDBH ) d on a.cpzjtzdid = d.cpzjtzdid where a.BYLX='入库质检' and a.DELFLAG='0' and nvl(a.TZBHGSL,0)-nvl(d.YTZBHGSL,0)>0)

field.lgName: 可处理通知不合格数量
已处理通知不合格数量
材料物资料收料单编号

table.pyName: (select a.*,b.LBM from t_erp_kc_clwzsldmx a LEFT JOIN T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX b on a.CLWZXXID=b.CLWZXXID and b.DELFLAG=0 where a.DELFLAG=0)
PS：动态表
(select nvl(ZJDBJ,'0') ZJDBJ,STATE,LBM,CLWZXXID,CLWZBH,CLWZMC,GGXH,BZDWID,BZDWMC,JLDWID,JLDWMC,HSGX,'0' CGDJ,'0' CGJE,'0' CGSL,'' WLXXYSID,'0' BHSDJ,'0' BHSJE from T_ERP_JC_CLWZXX)
( select u.*, a.SJXMC as SJSJZDMXMC from T_SYS_SJZDMX u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjsjzdmxid = a.sjzdmxid where u.sjzdid='YCXMLB' and u.delflag=0)
(select a.wldwbh,a.wldwmc,a.wldwxxid,a.wldwlx,b.yhzh,b.khhmc,a.state,a.delflag from T_ERP_CG_WLDWXX a left join t_erp_cg_wldwkhh b on a.wldwxxid = b.wldwxxid where a.delflag = 0)
